Articles.Content:
Okay, so i feel stupid! In a rush to signup because of frustration, i actidentially typed my username in as FrotnlineMist57 instead of FrontlineMist57.. does anyone know if there is a way to change this, or contact a mod to change it?

 

   Thanks,

        Suppost-to-be, Front

Hello, and welcome to the forums!

Don't worry, you're far from the first person to have a naming issue.  You want this.

A general FYI, if you're ever wondering "how do I contact a mod?" you can PM any one of us; we're listed here:

...or, even more simply, if you need to contact us about a particular post (your own, or anyone else's), just report the post (there's a "Report post" link just above each post)-- that'll get our attention.

Moving this to Kerbal Network (since it's about the forum rather than KSP itself), and locking (since I think the above pretty much answers the question.)
